title: #133 - Simulated Reality in Black Mirror
description: It's that spooky special time of year again when the ghosts and ghouls come out to play. That's right, it's time to watch Black Mirror. Oh, and also Halloween. This week Connor and Dan discuss some episodes from the third season of Black Mirror (available on Netflix) and the philosophical implications of simulated realities therein. There be spoilers in this ep so beware!
